procedures.body:
if $latest_version == true {
            // just the latest enabled version should be returned
            return SELECT
                child_stream_id,
                child_data_provider,
                weight,
                created_at,
                version,
                start_date
            FROM taxonomies
            WHERE version = get_current_version(false) AND disabled_at IS NULL
            ORDER BY created_at DESC;
        } else {
            return SELECT
                child_stream_id,
                child_data_provider,
                weight,
                created_at,
                version,
                start_date
            FROM taxonomies
            WHERE disabled_at IS NULL
            ORDER BY version DESC;
        }
